document_data.name: A is for Anchors
document_data.mainbody: '''''A is for Anchors''''' was a [[book]] one of a long-running series of mystery novels found on the [[Sea of Swords]] and the [[Nelanther Islands]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, the series reached the ''[[S is for Scurvy: A Pirate Potboiler]]'' volume, and anyone interested in reading the series all the way from ''A is for Anchors'' was thoroughly intimidated by the prospect. Many copies of these books could be found in the pirate-ridden [[Spindrift Town]] of the Nelanther Islands.
